title: Twitter’s media boss, Ross Hoffman, is leaving the company

author: Rachel Kaser
description:
The official Twitter account of Sweden was at the center of controversy after the person using it blocked 14k people en masse.

Sweden boasts a very democratic official Twitter account. ...
title: Sweden’s Twitter account blocked and unblocked 14,000 people

author: Denis Campbell
description: Poll of 14- to 24-year-olds shows Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat and Twitter increased feelings of inadequacy and anxiety
title: Facebook and Twitter 'harm young people's mental health'

author: BARBARA ORTUTAY
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Twitter's new privacy policy suggests ambitions of becoming more like Facebook — more tracking of users and more targeting of ads to rake in more money. Twitter recently reported its first quarterly revenue decline since going public. That should give you some clues about the reasons behind the policy changes, which take effect June 18. WHAT'S CHANGING? Twitter was already tracking users. For example, if you visited a webpage that had an embedded tweet or a button to share something on Twitter, you could be tracked and targeted.
title: What Twitter's privacy changes mean for you

description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — A co-founder of Twitter says he's sorry if the popular social media platform helped put Donald Trump in the White House, as the president has suggested. In an interview ( http://nyti.ms/2qGcKkm ) with The New York Times, Evan Williams says Twitter's role in Trump's populist rise is "a very bad thing." The president has credited Twitter with his election to the highest office in the land.
title: Twitter leader laments social media role in Trump's election

author: Napier Lopez
description:

title: It’s not just you: Twitter is down for many users

author: Julie Bort
description: Lee's use of Twitter is an interesting use-case for live video: as a way of being in touch with our representatives.
title: Republican senator hops on Twitter video to hold town hall-style meeting after Trump-Russia special counsel was announced

author: Gina Cherelus
description: A Massachusetts state college apologized on Saturday for Twitter messages filled with racist language, anti-immigrant speech and praise for President Donald Trump that had been sent from its hacked social media account.
title: Massachusetts college apologizes for racist tweets on hacked Twitter account
